articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Disney’s Splash Mountain gets a new name, date: Tiana’s Bayou Adventure
articles.description: Disney World’s and Disneyland’s Splash Mountain rides are being revamped based on the 2009 animated film The Princess and the Frog. Tiana’s Bayou Adventure is the new name for the rides, which are set to reopen in late 2024.
articles.content: Revamped rides at Disney World and Disneyland set to debut in late 2024

articles.title: Tekken’s history started under the name Kamui in 1994
articles.description: Early footage of Tekken shows a game more reminiscent of Virtua Fighter, and early design docs show a much different cast for Bandai Namco’s marquee fighting franchise.
articles.content: Early design docs show a much different cast

articles.description: Bandai Namco’s remaster/remake of fighting game JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle confirms 4 more fighters: F.F., Yukako Yamagishi, Jotaro Kujo (Diamond is Unbreakable), and Ikuro Hashizawa from Baoh: The Visitor.

articles.title: Minecraft YouTuber Technoblade passes away after battle with cancer
articles.description: Technoblade, one of Minecraft’s most popular and beloved content creators and streamers died following a battle with cancer at age 23. His father read a statement to fans in a final video from his channel.

articles.title: Skate insider program to offer early access to playtests of Skate 4
articles.description: EA says the new Skate is still “very early” in development and a new gameplay video shows off how it’s coming along. Skate 4 fans can also sign up for a skate insider program to playtest the game early.
articles.content: Skate still very early in development, developer says

articles.author: Nicole Clark
articles.title: The Sims 4 High School Years expansion pack is coming in July
articles.description: The Sims 4 High School Years expansion pack will be released on July 28. Sims go to Copperdale High, where they attend classes and extracurriculars, hang out at new date spots, and attend prom.
articles.content: The pack is coming in July, but the high school memories last forever
